page.title: 05CLUBS IN TERLING
page.content: Here are more details about Terling activities. {Brownies }meet on Wednesdays from 6pm. to 7.30pm. in their hut on Flacks Green. There are 24 brownies in our pack, some coming from outside the village. {The Football Club}meets on Saturdays to practise and every Sunday they play other villages. You must be over 16 to join, there are about 15 members at the moment. {The Shooting Club}has about 23 members at the moment. This club uses a field near Hatfield Peverel to practise clay pigeon shooting. {The Mothers and Toddlers group}calls itself{Wives and Under Fives.}It meets in the village hall on alternate Wednesday afternoons and has raised the funds through social functions to equip a childrens playground here.
